description: [Gamaredon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0047) tools decrypted additional payloads from the C2. [Gamaredon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0047) has also decoded base64-encoded source code of a downloader.(Citation: TrendMicro Gamaredon April 2020)(Citation: ESET Gamaredon June 2020) Additionally, [Gamaredon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0047) has decoded Telegram content to reveal the IP address for C2 communications.(Citation: unit42_gamaredon_dec2022)
